summary: Locks have a chance to jam when breaking a lockpick.
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][center][youtube][/youtube]
Big thanks toÂ [url=https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCoT4I8_MuYASPIJJaH9SKMQ]Thyworm[/url] for the review.[/center]


Description:

Whenever you break a lockpick you will lose a bit of your stamina and have a chance to jam the lock you are picking. As your stamina gets lower the chance to jam the lock increases. Locks will reset to their unjammed state after a configurable amount of time. NPCs can still open jammed doors and this will unjam the door.


Requirements:

SKSE and SkyUI if you want to change settings through the mcm.


Compatibility:

Should be compatible with most mods. Might not be compatible with mods that interfere with lock activation, like automating lockpicking.


Uninstallation:

Remove and clean your save with a script cleaning tool.


Bugs

None yet. Please report them in the comment section or via pm.
author: Zebrina

files.name: Vanilla
files.changelogHtml:
- Added a detection event whenever a lock is jammed. Configurable sound level.
- Trap triggers will set off the trap instead of getting jammed.
